title: Alistar's knock up
body:
does tenacity help reduce knock up time? ie: alistar's q and janna's q or just any knock up
because it doesn't say on the passive
Also how about  diana's pull and oriana's ult? does tenacity help reduce that as well?

replies.body: thanks that's what I want to know

Knockups/knockbacks can't be reduced by Tenacity.

However the Slow Diana's E applies will be reduced by Tenacity.

Keep in Mind Tenacity will reduce the duration of slows, not the strength.

It also wont reduce Suppressions like Hyper Kinetic Position Reverse, Infinite Duress and Nether Grasp.

You can't Cleanse, Mikael's or Quicksilver Sash Knockups/knockbacks either.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Crowd_control

All the info you need and then some.
